mxCell.value:
NatWest Banklin
Direct SFTP
INT019

NatWest UK Payroll Payments Outbound
  • Triggered on UK Payroll Settlement completion (automatic, manual launch if needed)
  • ISO 20022 v9 XML payment files (pain.001.001.09 - BACS format)
  • PGP encrypted using NatWest public key
  • SFTP with SSH key authentication
  • Document Transformation for NatWest-specific formatting
  • Swift MyStandards portal validation
NatWest processes BACS payments to employee bank accounts

• Trigger: Automatic on UK Payroll Settlement completion (The Football Association Limited%3CmxGraphModel%3E%3Croot%3E%3CmxCell%20id%3D%220%22%2F%3E%3CmxCell%20id%3D%221%22%20parent%3D%220%22%2F%3E%3CUserObject%20label%3D%22%26lt%3Bdiv%26gt%3B%26lt%3Bb%26gt%3BSYSTEM%20OF%20RECORD%26lt%3B%2Fb%26gt%3B%26lt%3B%2Fdiv%26gt%3B%26lt%3Bdiv%26gt%3B%26lt%3Bul%26gt%3B%26lt%3Bli%26gt%3BWorkday%3A%20Worker%20demographics%20%26amp%3Bamp%3B%20employment%20data%26lt%3B%2Fli%26gt%3B%26lt%3Bli%26gt%3BOkta%2FEntra%3A%20Identity%20%26amp%3Bamp%3B%20authentication%20attributes%26lt%3B%2Fli%26gt%3B%26lt%3B%2Ful%26gt%3B%26lt%3B%2Fdiv%26gt%3B%22%20placeholders%3D%221%22%20name%3D%22Variable%22%20id%3D%222%22%3E%3CmxCell%20parent%3D%221%22%20style%3D%22text%3Bhtml%3D1%3BstrokeColor%3Dnone%3BfillColor%3Dnone%3Balign%3Dleft%3BverticalAlign%3Dtop%3BwhiteSpace%3Dwrap%3Boverflow%3Dhidden%3BfontSize%3D14%3B%22%20vertex%3D%221%22%3E%3CmxGeometry%20height%3D%2290%22%20width%3D%22532.5%22%20x%3D%22560%22%20y%3D%22840%22%20as%3D%22geometry%22%2F%3E%3C%2FmxCell%3E%3C%2FUserObject%3E%3C%2Froot%3E%3C%2FmxGraphModel%3E)
  • Template: WPN ISO 20022 V9 Credit Transfer
  • Data Source: Workday Payroll Settlement Messages (pre-validated payment data)
  • Expected Volumes: 800-1000 employee payments per monthly payroll
  • File Format: ISO 20022 pain.001.001.09 XML (BACS payment type)
  • Bank Account: NatWest account ending *****347
  • Settlement trigger: Cannot be scheduled (Last Completed Pay Period not dynamic parameter)

• Document Transformation: XSLT-based transformation from Workday XML to ISO 20022 v9
  • NatWest-Specific Formatting: Applied via Document Transformation
  • Swift MyStandards Validation: File structure validated against ISO 20022 schema
  • Character Encoding: UTF-8 with special character translation
  • Date/Amount Formatting: Per ISO 20022 standard
  • Missing/Invalid Data: Triggers warnings or errors

• PGP Encryption: Payment file encrypted using NatWest-provided public key
  • Encryption Timing: Applied after file generation, before SFTP transmission
  • SFTP Authentication: SSH key-based (environment-specific keys)
  • Transmission: Encrypted file uploaded to NatWest Bankline Direct SFTP endpoint
  • Target Directory: Specified by NatWest Integration Manager
  • Delivery Confirmation: SFTP transmission status logged in Integration Event
  • Target: <10 minute end-to-end from settlement to NatWest delivery

• Integration Event: Created with status (Completed, Warnings, Errors, Failed, Aborted)
  • File Attachment: Original unencrypted XML payment file attached for audit
  • Retention: 180 days in Workday (downloadable for long-term archival)
  • HMRC Compliance: Files must be archived externally for 6+ years (regulatory requirement)
  • Notifications: Sent to Integration Administrator for warnings/errors/failures only
  • Success Rate Target: >98% successful runs
  • No Success Notifications: Reduces alert fatigue

UserObject.label:
SECURITY & TECHNICAL DETAILS
  • Integration Type: Workday Payments Network (WPN) - ISO 20022 V9 Credit Transfer
  • File Format: ISO 20022 pain.001.001.09 XML (BACS payment type)
  • Expected Volumes: 800-1000 employee payments per monthly payroll
  • Expected File Size: 1-2MB unencrypted, 2-3MB PGP encrypted
  • Encryption: PGP encryption using NatWest public key (environment-specific keys)
  • Authentication: SSH key-based SFTP (environment-specific keys)
  • Data in Transit: SSH encryption layer on SFTP connections
  • Data at Rest: AES-256 encryption in Workday
  • Document Retention: 180 days in Workday + external archival required for HMRC (6+ years)
  • File Validation: Swift MyStandards portal for ISO 20022 compliance
  • Environment Isolation: Separate SSH/PGP keys for Sandbox, Implementation, Production
  • Legal Entity: Wembley National Stadium Ltd
  • Bank Account: NatWest account ending *****347
  • Frequency: On UK Payroll Settlement completion (monthly typical)
  • Target Performance: <10 minutes end-to-end execution
UserObject.name: Variable

UserObject.label:
SYSTEM OF RECORD
  • Workday HCM: Employee master data, bank account details
  • Workday UK Payroll: Payroll processing, settlement data, payment calculations
  • Payroll Settlement Messages: Pre-validated payment data (source for integration)
  • Scope: Wembley National Stadium Ltd only; BACS payments only
  • Bank Account: NatWest account ending *****347
UserObject.name: Variable

UserObject.label:
KEY ATTRIBUTES SYNCHRONIZED

OUTBOUND (Payments):
  • Legal Entity: Wembley National Stadium Ltd, Bank details for *****347
  • Employee Payment: Employee ID, legal name, bank sort code, bank account number,
    payment amount (GBP), payment reference
  • Payment Metadata: Settlement ID, settlement date, pay period dates, payment date,
    payment method (BACS), total payment count, total payment amount
  • Group Header: Message ID, creation date/time, initiating party
  • Payment Information: Payment method, debtor account, execution date
  • Credit Transfer: Creditor details, payment amount, remittance information
NO INBOUND DATA - Outbound integration only
UserObject.name: Variable

UserObject.label:
ENVIRONMENT STRATEGY
  • Sandbox: Development, unit testing, key validation
  • Implementation (Preview): UAT, end-to-end testing with NatWest test environment
  • Production: Live UK payroll payments from April 2026 go-live
  • Environment-Specific Configuration:
    • Unique SSH keys per environment (regenerated on tenant migration)
    • Unique PGP key pairs per environment (NatWest public key for encryption)
    • Separate SFTP endpoints per environment (test vs production)
    • Production keys provided to NatWest immediately upon environment creation
  • Swift MyStandards Portal: Used to validate file format compliance before production
UserObject.name: Variable
